item.title: FAQ
item.description: Firewall Rules FAQ ​​ General ​​ How many rules can I have on my site? You can create a large number of rules. However, the number of active rules at any given time is limited. Refer to Availability for details on what is allowed per customer plan. ​​ Can I purchase additional active rules? No. The number of active rules is fixed based on customer plan. Refer to Availability.
